Articles.Content:
Just here to say hi, have been a member of the forums for some time now, but never actually posted anything, time to change that

A bit about my self:

I make a living as a professional programmer and educator, teaching C#

I have been playing KSP since 0.19 and love it and a huge admirer of all the different mods around for KSP.
Welcome to the forums. Get your students writing mods! We look forwards to the results :-)
Welcome Shasol, we have a great dedidicated community here one the forum.

I am considering creating a KSP Mod writing course for my students. But need to get more familiar with the API first, as there are no real documentation. Or rather no documentation of a standard i'm use to working with, from a professional point of view.

I am considering creating a KSP Mod writing course for my students. But need to get more familiar with the API first, as there are no real documentation. Or rather no documentation of a standard i'm use to working with, from a professional point of view.

Understood; it's all user-written as far as I know. You've probably already found it but the best place for mod-development information on these forums is http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/37-Add-on-Development
I am aware of it thanks. Thinking about creating a descent API documentation of the professional quality. It will take some time and allot of research, really think it could benefit the community.
